category.name: EA Gateway
category.category_description: Preferences for the Teamcenter Gateway for Enterprise Applications (T4EA)

preference.name: T4X_IDGEN_Function4EAX4FixedAsset
preference.preference_description: - T4X_IDGEN_USE_EXTERNAL_NUMBER uses the number generator of an external system - T4X_IDGEN_EXTERNAL_VERIFY_OF_NUMBER, validates the generated next Teamcenter Id against an external system
